text: Xiang Shouzhi (; November 28, 1917 â€“ September 2, 2017) was a Chinese general and revolutionist. He was born in Xuanhan County, Sichuan. Xiang was promoted to the rank of major general (shao jiang) in 1955 and general (Shang jiang) in 1988. He was a member of the 11st National Congress of the Communist Party of China and the 12nd CPC Central Committee. Xiang died on September 2, 2017 in Nanjing, China of heart failure at the age of 99. == References == Category:1917 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:Chinese generals Category:People from Sichuan Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Xiang Shouzhi
